name: Covid Strike Team
description:
Keyboard and Mouse Controls: 

- WASD: W (Up); A (Left); S (Down); D (Right)

- Mouse: Left Click (Fire Bubble Blaster); Right Click (Place an AB Wipe)


Keyboard Only Controls:

- WASD: W (Up); A (Left); S (Down); D (Right)

- IJKL: I (Shoot Up); J (Shoot Left); K (Shoot Down); L (Shoot Right);

- Spacebar: (Place an AB Wipe)

Summary:
As a white blood cell you are the last line of defense within the human body. Join the COVID Strike Team and defend the red blood cells from the Corona Beast as it becomes more powerful with every germ it absorbs. 

Features:
- Use your Bubble Blaster to fire soap. Clean up the germs to prevent them from destroying red blood cells and to shrink down the Corona Beast.

- Place anti-bacterial wipes to create a temporary shield or wall between you and the Corona Beast.

- Avoid germs and fight to save the human body!

- Collect vitamin c capsules to boost your resistance
